resources.string: Your ultimate campus campanion,\nconnecting students to the world.

Whether you're a developer, designer, marketer, or have skills in operations, there are various ways you can contribute to UniLink's success.
 
Development:
Android Development: Help enhance our Android app using Java. 

iOS Development: Contribute to the iOS version of UniLink using Swift. 

Backend Development: Work on server-side logic, database management, and API integrations using Firebase. 

Operations
Community Management: Engage with users, moderate discussions, and foster a positive community environment. 

User Support: Assist users with inquiries, troubleshooting, and feedback.
 
Marketing
Content Creation: Write blog posts, tutorials, and social media content to promote UniLink.
 
Growth Hacking: Develop strategies to increase user acquisition, retention, and engagement.
Ready to contribute or have questions? We\'d love to hear from you! Connect with us on LinkedIn. Links are provided in the settings page. Thank you!

Ever dreamt of solving mysteries with a team of detectives? 🕵‍♂🔍
 Ready to put your detective and coding skills to the test with a squad of 3? 🧩🔓

 💼 Presenting CID (COD'IN DETECTIVES)
 Round 1 : Kaun Banega Codepati?
 Round 2 : Fear Files
 Round 3 : EZSnippet
 Round 4 : Special Ops
 Round 5 : Daya, Darwaza tod do!
 
 Here's the scoop:
 💸 Prize Pool: ₹5,000
 📅 Date: 23rd May
 📍 Venue: APJ Abdul Kalam Lab, 4th Floor, Lab Block
 👥 Team Size: 3 members per team
 💰 Registration Fee: Just ₹50 per team
 
 Gather your team, and register as soon as possible to COD'IN DETECTIVES! 🌟

 Attendance will be granted to all participants!📈
